channel.title: Repair on HeaterTips
channel.description: Recent content in Repair on HeaterTips

item.title: How many Amps does a Diesel Heater use?
item.description: During startup, a diesel heater draws 8 - 12 Amps and during operation, it draws 0.25 - 2 Amps, depending on the fan and pump setting.

item.title: Diesel Heater E08 Error Code: How to Fix It
item.description: The E08 error code on a diesel heater means lack of fuel or flame put out. Reasons are no fuel, wind put out flame, or pressure in the tank.

item.title: Dyson F4 Error Code: How To Fix It
item.description: If your Dyson shows an F4 error, first try power cycling and checking for any obvious blockages or misalignments.

item.title: Dyson Drip Tray Overflow Error: How to Fix It
item.description: Usually, the drip tray overflow error can be fixed by drying the drip tray, performing a manual deep clean cycle, and forcing a hard reset.

item.title: Dyson Humidify+Cool Not Humidifying: How To Fix It
item.description: To fix your Dyson Humidify+Cool not humidifying, clean the pump column base cap and scrub off all the residue blocking water flow.

item.title: Dyson Deep Clean Cycle Not Working: How To Fix It
item.description: To fix the Dyson deep clean cycle, clean the pump column base cap to improve water flow into the pump, or replace the pump entirely.

item.title: Electric Kettle Keeps Boiling / Doesn’t Shut Off: How to Fix It
item.description: To fix your electric kettle that keeps boiling, replace the steam switch. Unscrew the top of the handle to uncover the black switch box.

item.title: Heat Storm Heater Not Working: How to Fix It
item.description: To fix your Heat Storm heater, check the power supply, clean filters, hard reset it, and inspect fan motor & circuitry.

item.title: Dyson Wrong Air Quality / Temperature: How to Fix It
item.description: To fix the Dyson air quality / temperature problem, reset to factory settings, holding both power buttons (on remote and fan) for 10 seconds.

item.title: Dyson Fan Warning Triangle (5 Fixes)
item.description: You should be able to fix your Dyson fan showing the warning triangle error by quickly lowering the fan speed after turning it on.

item.title: Dyson F2 Error Code: How to Fix It
item.description: To fix the F2 error in your Dyson fan, remove blocking parts from the fan motor, clean out dust, ensure the fan motor sits firmly in position

item.title: How to Reset the “F” Code On a Dyson Air Purifier
item.description: Resetting the “F” code on a Dyson fan and air purifier is as simple as replacing the filter and holding the power button for a few seconds.

item.title: Electric Heater E1 Error: How to Fix It
item.description: Usually, the source of the E1 error code is overheating due to dust, a faulty temperature sensor, or a faulty thermal cutoff switch.

item.title: Lasko Heater Keeps Shutting Off (3 Causes and Fixes)
item.description: Last ceramic heaters shut off on their own when they overheat. To fix it, open up the heater and remove the dust.

item.title: Dyson F3 Error Code: How to Fix It
item.description: To reset the F3 error code, hold the power button on your Dyson fan for 10 seconds. Turn your Dyson fan back on. Repeat until F3 is gone.

item.title: Mr. Heater Ceramic Burner Tile Replacement (in 6 Steps)
item.description: To replace your Mr. Heater Burner tile, you’ll need to buy a replacement burner tile kit for your Mr. Heater model.

item.title: Air Purifier Keeps Shutting Off (7 Reasons & Fixes)
item.description: Usually, air purifiers keep shutting off due to mechanical issues such as clogged filters or overheating.

item.title: Dyson H2 Error Code: How to Fix It
item.description: The H2 error code on your Dyson Hot+Cool fan signifies an overheating issue, due to dust and dirt accumulation around the heating elements.

item.title: Electric Fireplace Not Working: Tried & Tested Fixes
item.description: You can fix most electric fireplace issues by opening the back panel and visually checking the electronic circuitry.

item.title: How to Fix an Infrared Heater Not Working
item.description: To fix your infrared heater not working: Firmly smack it on the back. Push all infrared heating tubes in place. Remove all the dust.

item.title: How to Fix Space Heater Smell (Plastic, Burning)
item.description: To fix space heater smell: 1. Run your heater on full power 2. Clean the casing 3. Clean the heating elements 4. Check the power cord

item.title: How to fix a Space Heater Cord getting Hot
item.description: I measured the cord temperatures of two different space heaters. One cord got hot, the the other didn't. Here's why and how to fix it.

item.title: Space Heater making Noise (6 Sound Samples & Fixes)
item.description: Space heaters making clicking or humming noises are safe and expected. Screeching, squealing, or buzzing noises indicate electric issues.

item.title: Dyson Fan not Cooling (5 Fixes)
item.description: A Dyson fan is usually not cooling because of blocked airways (air filter, air inlet holes). Ensure it is not in backward airflow mode.

item.title: How to Fix a Coway Air Purifier not working (Repair Guide)
item.description: How to fix a Coway air purifier 1. not turning on, 2. not blowing air, 3. indicator light issues, 4. connectivity issues

item.title: Why your Air Purifier is not Removing Odors (+ Fixes)
item.description: Odor issue? Ensure your purifier has an activated carbon filter. Run it for 8+ hours and regularly replace filters. Tackle smell sources.

item.title: How to fix an Air Purifier not Collecting Dust
item.description: Your air purifier might not collect dust due to clogged filters, unsuitable room size, improper placement, or seals on new filters.

item.title: Air Purifier making Noise (8 Noises + Fixes)
item.description: Some noises, for example, quiet humming are normal. However, loud buzzing, screeching, or even banging noises indicate danger.

item.title: How to fix an Air Purifier not turning on
item.description: The most common cause of an air purifier not turning is the power source not working (wall outlet or power cord).

item.title: How to fix Swamp Cooler Smell
item.description: You can fix swamp cooler smell by cleaning or replacing the water pads. Also, clean the water tank with a vinegar and water solution.

item.title: How to fix a Dyna-Glo Heater not lighting
item.description: Dyna-Glo heaters usually don’t light when the pilot light is clogged, the thermocouple is dirty, or when the igniter doesn’t spark.

item.title: How to fix a Vornado Heater not working
item.description: To fix a Vornado heater not working, open the case, remove dust which causes overheating and inspect the electronic circuitry.

item.title: How to fix a Honeywell Space Heater not working
item.description: To fix your Honeywell heater not working, open its case and clean out all of the dust. Also, plug it in another wall outlet.

item.title: Evaporative Cooler not turning on (7 Fixes)
item.description: An evaporative cooler won’t turn on if it does not receive electric power. Causes are broken wall outlets, power cords, or blown fuses.

item.title: Swamp Cooler not Blowing Cold Air (8 Fixes)
item.description: Possible causes for a swamp cooler not blowing cold air are a broken fan, clogged air filters, a broken water pump, or clogged water lines.

item.title: Swamp Cooler making Noise (7 Fixes)
item.description: Swamp coolers make humming, gurgling and crackling noises. These are expected. You can reduce these normal noises with anti-vibration pads.

item.title: Window AC making Noise (9 Fixes)
item.description: Window AC noises are usually not dangerous. But scratching, whistling or banging noises indicate larger failures in your window AC.

item.title: Space Heater Smoking (4 Fixes)
item.description: Broken space heaters usually smoke from the heating elements, the internal power electronics, the power cord, or the case.

item.title: Wood Stove not getting hot (12 Fixes)
item.description: A wood stove usually does not get hot because of insufficient oxygen supply. You can fix this by cleaning the chamber, vents, and wood grate.

item.title: Propane Heater making Noise (7 Fixes)
item.description: Some propane heater noises such as clicking and crackling are normal. They come from the thermostat, or heater parts expanding.

item.title: Dyson Fan not Rotating (7 Fixes)
item.description: Dyson heaters usually don’t rotate if there’s still tape on your Dyson fan's base body split section. Also the rotor could be defective.

item.title: Propane Heater keeps shutting off (7 Fixes)
item.description: Propane heaters usually keep shutting off and don’t stay lit because of a dirty pilot light or thermocouple.

item.title: How to fix a Mr. Heater Buddy not lighting
item.description: You can fix your Mr. Heater Buddy not lighting by cleaning the pilot light opening with a Q-tip and rubbing alcohol. Also, firmly smack your Mr. Heater 5-10 times.

item.title: How to fix a Dyson Heater not turning on
item.description: You can fix a Dyson heater not turning on by making sure the wall outlet and power cord work. Clean the airways (inlet holes, air filter).

item.title: How to Fix a Dyson Heater not Blowing Hot Air
item.description: Your Dyson heater does not blow hot air if airways are blocked with dust and moisture. You can fix this by dry-brushing internal parts.

item.title: How to fix a Window Air Conditioner not Cooling
item.description: To fix a window air conditioner not cooling, ensure that all airways are free. Clean the evaporator coil. Ensure that the power supply is OK.

item.title: Why is my Oil-filled Radiator not getting hot? (6 Fixes)
item.description: Oil-filled radiators stop heating because of a broken thermostat. Also, the thermostat can cut off the heating if the room is already warm.

item.title: How to fix a Portable AC not turning on
item.description: : To fix a portable AC not turning on, check fuses and circuit breakers. Ensure the wall outlet is powered. Check clogged air filters.

item.title: Why does your Portable Air Conditioner Collect no Water?
item.description: Your portable air conditioner collects no water because it is either broken or the water tank leaks. Low air humidity is also a cause.

item.title: How to Fix a Portable Air Conditioner not Cooling
item.description: To fix your portable air conditioner not cooling, insulate the hose using aluminum wrap and HVAC tape. Clean air filters and evaporator coil.

item.title: Space Heater not Blowing Hot Air (How to fix it)
item.description: Your space heater is not blowing hot air because of an electronic issue. The simplest fix is to just get a new space heater.

item.title: Space Heater keeps shutting off (5 reasons and how to fix it)
item.description: Your space heater keeps shutting off. Here are 5 reasons and fixes. Usually it is best to replace faulty space heaters.
